document.full_text: oregon state lawmakers, capitalizing on a long-running internet meme, have created a youtube sensation by slipping the lyrics from a song by 1980s pop star rick astley into floor speeches.
document.title: "rick-rolling" oregon lawmakers a hit on youtube
lines_and_colors: oregon state lawmakers, capitalizing on a long-running internet meme, have created a youtube sensation by slipping the lyrics from a song by 1980s pop star rick astley into floor speeches.
